text:
Hello Everyone, 
Just wondering what other organizations are currently doing for proxy (be
filter) servers or appliance or cloud. 
We have traditionally used Barracuda appliance to provide spam filtering and
reporting functions for users web activities and all web related content is
routed through them. 
What does everyone else use that works for you and that you might recommend. 
Appreciate any/all suggestions. 
Cheers 
Many thanks in advance for your time. 
Regards, 
Laszlo 
Laszlo Denes 
Technical Analyst Servers 
Information Systems 
The Salvation Army Toronto Grace Health Centre 
650 Church Street, Toronto, ON M4Y 2G5 
t: 416-925-2251 ext. 214 
f: 416-925-3211 
 
www.torontograce.org
 
[cid:image001.png@01DA326E.11438540]
 [cid:image002.png@01DA326E.11438540]
 [cid:image003.png@01DA326E.11438540]

[cid:image004.png@01DA326E.11438540]
 
Exceptional and compassionate care for all. 
--
%40YQBPR01MB10286.CANPRD01.PROD.OUTLOOK.COM

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Proxy Servers
